description: This source file defines a Flutter widget for a dashboard screen in a healthcare management app. It includes a main DashboardScreen class that builds a scrollable view with header and info cards, and an internal _InfoCard widget class for displaying individual info sections.

classes.name: DashboardScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the dashboard interface, displaying a header and a list of informational cards.

classes.name: _InfoCard
classes.description: A private stateless widget that displays a titled card with a subtitle, styled according to theme.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for both DashboardScreen and _InfoCard widgets, defining the UI layout.
